API¶

schist.inference.nested_model(adata[, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Peixoto14].

schist.inference.nested_model_multi(adatas)

Cluster cells into subgroups using multiple modalities.

schist.inference.planted_model(adata[, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Peixoto14].

schist.inference.flat_model(adata[, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Peixoto14].

schist.inference.leiden(adata[, resolution, …])

Cluster cells into subgroups [Traag18].

schist.plotting.alluvial(adata[, …])

Generate an alluvial plot for NSBM hierarchy

schist.plotting.draw_tree(adata[, level, …])

Plots NSBM hierarchy using graph-tool capabilities

schist.tools.cell_similarity(adata[, …])

Calculate cell similarity score based on the kNN graph.

schist.tools.cell_stability(adata[, …])

Calculate cell stability given cell affinity.

schist.tools.cluster_consistency(adata[, …])

Calculate cluster consistency at a given level

schist.tools.calculate_affinity(adata[, …])

Calculate cell affinity given a partition scheme.

schist.tools.draw_graph(adata[, layout, …])

Extends scanpy.tools.draw_graph function using some layouts available in graph-tool library.

schist.tools.get_cell_back_p(state[, level])

Returns the matrix of proabilities of moving a cell back to its group from a different block

schist.tools.get_cell_loglikelihood(state[, …])

Returns the matrix of log-likelihood differences when moving a cell into a different block
